column4: hey, I am unable to get mplayerplugin working with my edgy install, can anyone help? It keeps trying to buffer but it never plays video
you mean in firefox ?
yes
use synaptic to remove  totem-mozilla
already did that
realy ?  and make sure that mplayer-mozilla is installed ?
yep its installed
codecs ?
it keeps trying to buffer the video and it fails to start playing, yes w32codecs is installed
remove mplater mozilla  completely from synaptic using the completely remove option, that will get rid of the local settings files and then install again
same problem it keeps cycling between connected and connecting to
try a different site maybe ?
all sites
tried BBC CNN Yahoo
all work on my debian install
right click on the applet in the browser,  go to properties , and try adjusting the buffer
you can also try asking the nice ppl in #mplayer , they might have an idea
when I changed that, it just cycles between the connecting and connected more rapidly
well at least it is having some effect
try asking in #mplayer,  I'm out of ideas
ok thanks
